attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STOP THIS TRADE JOIN OUR FIGHT
ban knife sales at open air markets 
on sale are all kinds of knives bayonets flick knives CS gas crossbows riffles and lots more.
these traders should be banned.
please stop wepons being sold on markets now!.register below

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
